# SafariSettings.CookiePolicy.visitedWebsites

**Case**

A policy that indicates the device only accepts cookies from websites in the user’s browsing history.

## Declaration

```swift
case visitedWebsites
```

## Accepting Cookies

- **SafariSettings.CookiePolicy.always**: A policy that indicates the device accepts cookies from all websites.
- **SafariSettings.CookiePolicy.currentWebsite**: A policy that indicates the device only accepts cookies from the current website.
- **SafariSettings.CookiePolicy.never**: A policy that indicates the device doesn’t accept cookies from any website.
